channel.title: Gabe's Superhero Show
channel.description: Now and then, Gabe rambles about Superheroes from his very own Fortress of Solitude. Rambling about other things as well. Now featuring the lovely co-host Mandy! plus random readings from the DC Comics Encyclopedia! Smell the Greatness!!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Comic books and random Geekery from Gabe and Mandy a wonderful couple!
channel.itunes:author: Gabe Russo
channel.itunes:summary: Now and then, Gabe rambles about Superheroes from his very own Fortress of Solitude. Rambling about other things as well. Now featuring the lovely co-host Mandy! plus random readings from the DC Comics Encyclopedia! Smell the Greatness!!

item.title: In The Garden with Mandy and Gabe
item.description:
Weekly 10 minutes or so of garden updates, folk knowledge, wit and wisdom from Mandy and Gabe who are married and have a garden. Episode 1 Mandy tells us what's planted so far
email us at inthegardenwithmandyandgabe@hotmail.com with any comments or questions.
happy gardening!
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary:
Weekly 10 minutes or so of garden updates, folk knowledge, wit and wisdom from Mandy and Gabe who are married and have a garden. Episode 1 Mandy tells us what's planted so far
email us at inthegardenwithmandyandgabe@hotmail.com with any comments or questions.
happy gardening!

item.title: Episode 14
item.description: Sorry about the audio, it's a little scratchy. Gabe and Mandy talk about getting on i-tunes gabe's surgery the dark knight raymond feist martin millar and hero/villain readings from the dc comics encyclopedia hope you enjoy the more regular episodes coming up as well.
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary:
Sorry about the audio, it's a little scratchy. Gabe and Mandy talk about getting on i-tunes gabe's surgery the dark knight raymond feist martin millar
and hero/villain readings from the dc comics encyclopedia
hope you enjoy the more regular episodes coming up as well.

item.title: Comics and More with Mandy and Gabe episode 3
item.description: Gabe and Mandy talk about Conan some more and Crossing Midnight, then the new Wizard magazine, then Heroes. Followed by readings from the DC Comics Encyclopedia. Enjoy. Contact us at comicartgabe@yahoo.co.uk
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: Gabe and Mandy talk about Conan some more and Crossing Midnight, then the new Wizard magazine, then Heroes. Followed by readings from the DC Comics Encyclopedia. Enjoy. Contact us at comicartgabe@yahoo.co.uk

item.title: Comics and More episode 2
item.description: Episode 2. We read from the DC Encyclopedia, and discuss many wonderful and fascinating topics. We're back and it feels damn good!
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: Episode 2. We read from the DC Encyclopedia, and discuss many wonderful and fascinating topics. We're back and it feels damn good!

item.title: Comics and More with Gabe and Mandy
item.description: Mandy's first co-hosted show! Smell the goodness. Either episode 12 or 1 depending on how you look at it.
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: Mandy's first co-hosted show! Smell the goodness. Either episode 12 or 1 depending on how you look at it.

item.title: Gabe's Superhero Show
item.description: Episode 11, this is old, but I'm putting the last 3 episodes up. Sorry for the delay, problems solved. Enjoy. We're up to ep. 13, so look for us. Collect em all.
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: Episode 11, this is old, but I'm putting the last 3 episodes up. Sorry for the delay, problems solved. Enjoy. We're up to ep. 13, so look for us. Collect em all.

item.title: Gabe's Superhero Show episode 10!
item.description: This is the 10th episode!! They grow up so fast. Gabe talks about x-men 3, superman returns, selling comics on ebay, new fans of the show, and new baby stuff. Also a Super mural on baby's wall? check back for pics! My new work website is www.mysticmountainstudio.bravehost.com please check it out.
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: This is the 10th episode!! They grow up so fast. Gabe talks about x-men 3, superman returns, selling comics on ebay, new fans of the show, and new baby stuff. Also a Super mural on baby's wall? check back for pics! My new work website is www.mysticmountainstudio.bravehost.com please check it out.

item.title: Gabe's Superhero Show- episode 9
item.description: Gabe talks about the new baby, spoilt!, x-men 3 and superman trailers, free magazine subs and lots of other fascinating topics. Watercooler baby!!
item.dc:creator: Gabe Russo
item.itunes:summary: Gabe talks about the new baby, spoilt!, x-men 3 and superman trailers, free magazine subs and lots of other fascinating topics. Watercooler baby!!
